body.name: Bulgarian Rose Moisturizing Tonic with Natural Rose Oil, Rose Water Hydrating Toner, Facial Skin Moisturizer Hydrating Natural Cleanser

features: Hydration: Bulgarian rose oil is known for its moisturizing properties. A rose-infused tonic can help provide an extra layer of hydration to your skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple. Soothing: Rose oil has natural properties that can help calm and soothe irritated or sensitive skin. Using a rose-infused tonic may help reduce redness and discomfort.

Balancing pH: Toners are often used to restore the skin's pH balance after cleansing, which can help improve overall skin health. The natural pH of rose water is close to that of the skin, making it a gentle option for balancing the skin's pH.

Prepares for Further Skincare: Applying a moisturizing tonic before serums and moisturizers helps prepare the skin to better absorb subsequent products, allowing them to work more effectively. Antioxidant Protection: Roses are rich in antioxidants, which can help protect the skin from environmental stressors like pollution and UV radiation, potentially reducing the signs of aging.

Aromatherapy Benefits: The fragrance of Bulgarian rose oil is renowned for its calming and uplifting properties. Using a rose-infused tonic can provide a sensory experience that promotes relaxation and reduces stress.

Enhanced Glow: Hydrated and well-balanced skin tends to have a healthy and radiant glow. Regular use of a rose-infused tonic may contribute to a more luminous complexion. Gentle Refreshment: Applying a moisturizing tonic throughout the day can provide a gentle refreshment to your skin, especially in dry or air-conditioned environments.
body.description: Rose Original moisturizing tonic from Bulgarian Rose nourishes, softens and rejuvenates the skin and improves its overall condition. The rose tonic is suitable for dry, sensitive and normal skin. The natural rose oil and rose water have powerful rejuvenating properties. After a more prolonged use the skin becomes more elastic and looks rejuvenated. - Extra softness and elasticity. - With 100% natural rose water. - Used for all skin types. - Natural moisturzing face tonic. - Free of parabens.
